name: East Texas Flying Service, Inc.
about: East Texas Flying Service, Inc., located at Wood County/Collins Field (JDD), is a reputable flight training and aviation services provider. Established to serve the aviation needs of East Texas, the school offers FAA Part 61 flight training programs. Although not approved for VA training, the facility is well-equipped to handle various aviation requirements. Under the management of Patty Burch, the service operates from 8am to 6pm, with no ramp fees. In addition to flight training, East Texas Flying Service Inc. also provides comprehensive aircraft maintenance services, catering to a range of aircraft types. With a focus on quality and reliability, East Texas Flying Service Inc. is a trusted name in aviation education and maintenance in the region.
